example.text: CLICK HERE to read my statement on the Federal Reserve's most recent interest rate hike and what it'll mean for hardworking families. The cost-of-living has risen 14.3% since Biden took office - robbing nearly 2 months' salary from the wallets of hardworking Americans.

Inflation isn't going away on its own. President Biden needs to sit down with Republicans to figure out a way to rein in reckless spending. Workers and small businesses need common-sense solutions to fight inflation, grow the economy, and life more Americans out of poverty. [[url]]

READING HERE In Case you missed it I'm honored to receive the Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget's 2022 Fiscal Hero award. I'll keep fighting tooth and nail to stop the reckless spending, restore fiscal restraint in Washington, and get our economy back on track.

CLICK HERE to watch my full interview on Newsmax with Eric Bolling where I took Biden to task for lying to the American people about his administration's out-of-control spending. The greatest theft of taxpayer dollars in American history occurred under Biden's watch.

LEGISLATIVE UPDATE S 5230 : Requires the Attorney General to operate and maintain the National Missing and Unidentified Persons System (NamUs) to be the national resource center for missing and unidentified persons PASSED, REP SMITH VOTED YES HR 1437 : Extends government funding by an additional week as Democrats push towards a massive trillion-dollar spending bill on their way out the door versus putting all spending on hold until Republicans take control of the US House in two weeks. PASSED, REP SMITH VOTED NO Washington, DC 1011 Longworth HOB Washington, DC 20515 p: (202) 225-4404 f: (202) 226-0326 Cape Girardeau 2502 Tanner Drive, Ste.

PASSED, REP. SMITH VOTED YES .3 : Condemns the acts of violence and destruction that have been committed against pro-life facilities in the aftermath of the Dobbs v. Jackson decision. PASSED, REP. SMITH VOTED YES .11 : Creates a Select Committee that will focus on the threat posed by the Chinese Communist Party.
